theory.brief: Unit 5 học về thì hiện tại hoàn thành (Present Perfect) dùng để diễn tả: (1) Hành động đã hoàn thành nhưng không xác định rõ thời gian, (2) Hành động bắt đầu trong quá khứ và còn tiếp tục ở hiện tại, (3) Kinh nghiệm trong quá khứ. Cấu trúc: S + have/has + V3/ed
examples: I have finished my homework. (Tôi đã hoàn thành bài tập.)
She has lived here for 5 years. (Cô ấy đã sống ở đây được 5 năm.)
Have you ever been to Japan? (Bạn đã từng đến Nhật Bản chưa?)
They have just visited Da Lat. (Họ vừa mới thăm Đà Lạt.)

exercises.question: I __________ an eco-tour to Mount Langbiang.
exercises.explanation: Dùng Present Perfect với 'have' + V3 để diễn tả kinh nghiệm
hints: Dùng have + V3 với chủ ngữ 'I'

exercises.question: She __________ many photos of the magnificent scenery.
exercises.explanation: Dùng 'has' với chủ ngữ số ít + V3 (taken)
hints: Chủ ngữ 'She' đi với 'has'

exercises.question: They __________ never __________ a gong show before.
exercises.explanation: Never đi với Present Perfect: have + never + V3
hints: Never là dấu hiệu của Present Perfect

exercises.question: __________ you ever __________ to Cu Lan Village?
exercises.explanation: Ever dùng trong câu hỏi Present Perfect: Have + S + ever + V3?
hints: Ever dùng với Have + V3

exercises.question: We __________ just __________ from our trip to Da Lat.
exercises.explanation: Just là dấu hiệu Present Perfect: have/has + just + V3
hints: Just đi với have + V3

exercises.question: Tom __________ many thrilling rides in his life.
exercises.explanation: Kinh nghiệm trong đời dùng Present Perfect với 'has'
hints: Chủ ngữ 'Tom' đi với 'has'

exercises.question: I __________ this area for 10 years.
exercises.explanation: 'For + khoảng thời gian' dùng với Present Perfect
hints: For 10 years là dấu hiệu Present Perfect

exercises.question: She __________ a jeep to the top of the mountain yet.
exercises.explanation: Yet trong câu phủ định: hasn't/haven't + V3 + yet
hints: Yet đi với Present Perfect phủ định

exercises.question: How long __________ you __________ English?
exercises.explanation: 'How long' hỏi về thời gian kéo dài dùng Present Perfect
hints: How long + have/has + S + V3

exercises.question: They __________ in this village since 2010.
exercises.explanation: 'Since + mốc thời gian' dùng với Present Perfect
hints: Since 2010 là dấu hiệu Present Perfect

exercises.question: Mi __________ already __________ the flora and fauna there.
exercises.explanation: Already đi với Present Perfect: has + already + V3
hints: Already là dấu hiệu Present Perfect

exercises.question: __________ he __________ the stream yet?
exercises.explanation: Yet trong câu hỏi: Has/Have + S + V3 + yet?
hints: Yet đi với Has/Have + V3

exercises.question: We __________ three amazing experiences this month.
exercises.explanation: 'This month' (tháng này) dùng với Present Perfect
hints: This month chỉ thời gian đến hiện tại

exercises.question: She __________ never __________ such magnificent scenery.
exercises.explanation: Never với Present Perfect: has/have + never + V3
hints: Never đi với has + V3

exercises.question: I __________ to dance with local people many times.
exercises.explanation: 'Many times' (nhiều lần) dùng với Present Perfect
hints: Many times là dấu hiệu Present Perfect

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: I have just returned from an eco-tour
acceptedAnswers: I have just returned from an eco-tour
I have just returned from an eco-tour.
hints: Just đi với have + V3

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: She has visited Mount Langbiang twice
acceptedAnswers: She has visited Mount Langbiang twice
She has visited Mount Langbiang twice.
hints: Twice (2 lần) dùng với Present Perfect

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: They have never seen a gong show before
acceptedAnswers: They have never seen a gong show before
They have never seen a gong show before.
hints: Never đi với have + V3

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: Have you ever been to Cu Lan Village
acceptedAnswers: Have you ever been to Cu Lan Village
Have you ever been to Cu Lan Village?
Have you ever been to Cu Lan Village.
hints: Ever dùng trong câu hỏi Present Perfect

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: We have lived here for five years
acceptedAnswers: We have lived here for five years
We have lived here for five years.
hints: For + khoảng thời gian dùng Present Perfect

exercises.question: Tom __________ already __________ many pictures of the scenery.
exercises.explanation: Already: has + already + V3
hints: Already đi giữa has và V3

exercises.question: __________ she __________ riding a horse?
exercises.explanation: Câu hỏi Present Perfect với chủ ngữ 'she'
hints: Chủ ngữ 'she' đi với 'Has'

exercises.question: I __________ this brilliant stream since I was a child.
exercises.explanation: 'Since + mệnh đề quá khứ' dùng Present Perfect
hints: Since I was a child là dấu hiệu Present Perfect

exercises.question: They __________ not __________ that movie yet.
exercises.explanation: Yet trong câu phủ định: have not + V3 + yet
hints: Yet đi với have + V3

exercises.question: How many times __________ you __________ to that place?
exercises.explanation: 'How many times' dùng với Present Perfect
hints: How many times + have + V3

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: Tom has explored the area many times
acceptedAnswers: Tom has explored the area many times
Tom has explored the area many times.
hints: Many times dùng Present Perfect

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: She has not finished her work yet
acceptedAnswers: She has not finished her work yet
She has not finished her work yet.
She hasn't finished her work yet
She hasn't finished her work yet.
hints: Yet đi cuối câu phủ định

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp các từ thành câu hoàn chỉnh
exercises.correctSentence: We have taken an eco-tour this month
acceptedAnswers: We have taken an eco-tour this month
We have taken an eco-tour this month.
hints: This month dùng Present Perfect

exercises.question: I __________ never __________ such a thrilling ride before.
exercises.explanation: Never + before dùng Present Perfect
hints: Never before là dấu hiệu rõ của Present Perfect

exercises.question: __________ they __________ the local specialities?
exercises.explanation: Câu hỏi về kinh nghiệm dùng Present Perfect
hints: Have + they + V3 để hỏi về kinh nghiệm
